metadata.title: Complete Genome Sequences of Porcine Epidemic Diarrhea Virus Strains JSLS-1/2015 and JS-2/2015 Isolated from China

abstract.original_text: Two porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV) strains, JSLS-1/2015 and JS-2/2015, were isolated from piglets with watery diarrhea in South China. Two genomic sequences were highly homologous to the attenuated DR13 strain. Furthermore, JSLS-1/2015 contains a 24-amino-acid deletion in open reading frame 1b, which was first reported in PEDV isolates.

sentences.segment_text: Two porcine epidemic diarrhea virus ( PEDV ) strains ,
were isolated from piglets with watery diarrhea in South China .
Two genomic sequences were highly homologous to the attenuated DR13 strain .
Furthermore , JSLS-1 / 2015 contains a 24-amino-acid deletion in open reading frame 1b ,
which was first reported in PEDV isolates .
